name: Sea of Hatred
description:
*PLEASE PLAY THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN, THE SIDES ARE CUT OFF IF YOU DO NOT*

Experience the insane underwater adventure of a jellyfish diver, as you must collect all 7 children of The Orb King. This game will make you go clinically insane.

Made for a 3 day gamejam at our university.

Trailer link (required by the university): https://youtu.be/PX6BAKeXdyU
